images.description: Determines how to handle images, if set to proxy, fHDHR will reverse proxy the images.

method.description: Which EPG methods will be updated on the schedule. Can be set to None, or Origins, or a comma seperated list of Origins.

update_frequency.description: Determines how often (in seconds) to update EPG methods.

reverse_days.description: Determines the amount of days before time.now to create block EPG data for if missing.

forward_days.description: Determines the amount of days after the end of EPG data to create block EPG data for if missing.

block_size.description: Determines the time in seconds for a block of generated data to be created.

xmltv_offset.description: Allows users with timezone issues to add an offset in the format +/-HHMM. Defaults to +0000
